title: Cloudtrail Service is disabled
summary: CloudTrail logging is not enabled for this region. It should be enabled.

title: TCP port 1433 is open
summary: Important TCP port is open and / or open to the world.

summary: These brief instructions will help you get started quickly with CloudCoreo.

title: Cloudtrail Service is disabled
summary: CloudTrail logging is not enabled for this region. It should be enabled.

title: Host IP added to Security Group
summary: Specific host IP address added to Security Group

title: Security group specifies a port range
summary: Security group specifies a port range rather than individual ports.

title: Security group unrestricted traffic
summary: All IP addresses are allowed to access resources in the affected security group.

title: Old ELB SSL policy
summary: Elastic Load Balancing (ELB) SSL policy is not the latest Amazon predefined SSL policy or is a custom ELB SSL policy.

title: Active user key not rotated
summary: User has active keys that have not been rotated in the last 90 days.

title: Passwords not set to expire
summary: The current password policy doesn't require users to regularly change their passwords. User passwords are set to never expire.

title: Inactive access key not rotated
summary: User has inactive keys that have not been rotated in the last 90 days.

title: Passwords policy doesn't exist
summary: There currently isn't a password policy to require a certain password length, password expiration, prevent password reuse, and other parameters.

title: Account has multiple active access keys
summary: The affected account has multiple active AWS access keys.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication not enabled
summary: Affected user does not have Multi-Factor Authentication enabled on their account

title: Users can reuse old passwords
summary: The current password policy doesn't prevent users from reusing their old passwords.

title: Root user has active password
summary: Root user has been logging in with a password.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication not enabled for root account
summary: Root user does not have Multi-Factor Authentication enabled on their cloud account

title: Scroll layout
summary: This page demonstrates how you the integration of a script called ScrollTo, which is used here to link definitions of a JSON code sample to a list of definitions for that particular term. The scenario here is that the JSON blocks are really long, with extensive nesting and subnesting, which makes it difficult for tables below the JSON to adequately explain the term in a usable way.

title: TCP port is open
summary: Important TCP port is open, potentially to the world.
